document_data.caption: [[Bucklal Boldover]], [[Baelam]], and Elsura Dauniir.
document_data.name: Elsura Dauniir
document_data.mainbody: '''Elsura Dauniir''' was a [[human]] [[wizard]] and later a field agent of the [[Moonstars]] for [[northwest Faer√ªn]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: She had the unique ability to transform herself into a black [[cat]] at will.
document_data.History:
Elsura was born in [[Silverymoon]], with her father [[Aumar the Lion]] a guardscaptain in the [[spellguard]], and she grew up in the company of [[elves]] and [[Harpers]]. As teenager, she joined the [[archmage]] [[Tasirin]], becoming his cook and companion. One night Elsura vanished and she reappeared only a year later at her father's funeral in the form of a cat.

At this point Lady [[Alustriel]] offered her to be tutored in magic by [[Harper]] wizards and Elsura agreed. For a time she was the student of the adventuress [[Sharanralee]].

Afterward Elsura went to [[Myth Drannor]] and tried to build there a refuge for herself and her friends.
 
In the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, she was chosen as a field agent of the Moonstars for [[the North]]; she was quite famous in the region and some people, especially in [[Luskan]], spoke of being "clawed by Elsura" to indicate an unexpected and often deadly surprise.

In the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, she was among the many powerful mages [[Khelben Arunsun]] brought together in order to cleanse part of the [[High Moor]] and restore [[Faer'tel'miir]], a lost city of [[Miyeritar]].<ref>
document_data.Personality: Elsura was said to have the same personality as a cat. She hated slavers and those how hunted for sport. Elsura was shy, moody and very slow to trust someone.
